fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, BLAST THE FUCKING SHIT OUT OF SOMEONE, immediately dealing an Overkill attack to them right there and then.
- During the night, BLAST THE FUCKING SHIT OUT OF SOMEONE'S HOUSE, immediately dealing an Overkill attack to them and whoever intended on visiting them right there and then.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have no penalty for killing Town roles.
- If you are visited by a non-Town role, you will die.
- If two or more people visit you in the same night, you will die.
